metadata.name: WhoAmI as Parameter
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious process command line that uses whoami as first parameter (as e.g. used by EfsPotato)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe whoami')))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious process command line that uses whoami as first parameter (as e.g. used by EfsPotato)
